body:
I added some code that will automatically sense if you have started the units with ( or [ so that you can now get the units displaying as you like

Thank you!

I am not sure if the use of ( or [ is an international standard.

There are different positions about this aspect. You can read more about [here](https://www.researchgate.net/post/Units_do_not_belong_in_brackets_eg_for_lengths_m_is_NOT_valid_why_do_most_journals_and_scientists_not_follow_ISO_31-0).
